comments.body: Good luck bro! But I think the best idea is to have a nice slow Christmas eve by yourself and then try to get out to meet some people at international pubs at like the 25/26.

comments.author: heatheraudrey
comments.body: What part of Stockholm are you staying in? Sorry about the lack of snow. If you take the train for the day just a little north to Uppsala, there might still be a little snow there. There was on Saturday at least. They have a nice river through town and huge church you can tour for free.

comments.author: NeoGoober
comments.body:
Christmas is family only in Sweden, even inviting friends is considered absurd.
If you happen to find someone who will invite a stranger to their Christmas celebration, they most likely have some ulterior motive (like recruiting you into a religious cult).
